Address.description: The address of the house in Amsterdam

Zip.description: The zip code of the house

Price.description: The price of the house in Euros

Area.description: The area of the house in square meters

Room.description: The number of rooms in the house

Lon.description: The longitude coordinate of the house

Lat.description: The latitude coordinate of the house

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate price prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, including address, zip code, area, number of rooms, longitude, and latitude, please predict the price.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted price of the house is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate area estimation.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, including address, zip code, price, number of rooms, longitude, and latitude, please estimate the area.
prompt.answer_prompt: The estimated area of the house is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate room number prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the house, including address, zip code, price, area, longitude, and latitude, please predict the number of rooms.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of rooms in the house is.
